本書參考的主要文獻與延伸閱讀資源列於下方。

## 統計學經典教材

1. Casella, G., & Berger, R. L. (2002). *Statistical Inference* (2nd ed.). Duxbury Press.

2. Gelman, A., Carlin, J. B., Stern, H. S., Dunson, D. B., Vehtari, A., & Rubin, D. B. (2013). *Bayesian Data Analysis* (3rd ed.). Chapman and Hall/CRC.

3. Hastie, T., Tibshirani, R., & Friedman, J. (2009). *The Elements of Statistical Learning: Data Mining, Inference, and Prediction* (2nd ed.). Springer.

## 醫學統計專書

4. Collett, D. (2015). *Modelling Survival Data in Medical Research* (3rd ed.). Chapman and Hall/CRC.

5. Hosmer, D. W., Lemeshow, S., & May, S. (2008). *Applied Survival Analysis: Regression Modeling of Time-to-Event Data* (2nd ed.). Wiley.

6. Armitage, P., Berry, G., & Matthews, J. N. S. (2001). *Statistical Methods in Medical Research* (4th ed.). Blackwell Science.

## 微積分教材

7. Stewart, J. (2015). *Calculus: Early Transcendentals* (8th ed.). Cengage Learning.

8. Thomas, G. B., Weir, M. D., & Hass, J. R. (2018). *Thomas' Calculus* (14th ed.). Pearson.

## R 語言與資料視覺化

9. Wickham, H., & Grolemund, G. (2016). *R for Data Science: Import, Tidy, Transform, Visualize, and Model Data*. O'Reilly Media.

10. Wickham, H. (2016). *ggplot2: Elegant Graphics for Data Analysis* (2nd ed.). Springer.

11. Chang, W. (2018). *R Graphics Cookbook: Practical Recipes for Visualizing Data* (2nd ed.). O'Reilly Media.
